A month later, Kimberly's adapted to her new job well.
1143112331.content:
One morning, Kimberly Drummond was reading through the want ads in the newspaper at the Drummond penthouse. She was in her junior year of high school and was looking for a part time job for the summer. Though her father had offered to help her, Kimberly was sure she could handle finding a job single handedly.

As she scanned the want ads, she noticed an ad for a modeling job. "'Applicators must be 13-19 years of age, attractive and friendly. Job pays $500 dollars an hour and includes commercial appearances'." Kimberly read aloud, her eyes wide in delight. Quickly, she wrote down the number and went to it, via a taxi.

When she arrived at the address, Kimberly was somewhat shocked. It was the address of a diaper company. "'Big Boom Boom's Diaper Co'." she read the sign allowed. "Huh. Guess I shoulda read the name of the business." She remarked. But then, she shrugged. "Ah well. Might as well give it a shot." she smiled as she entered the building.

A young female modeling agent was standing there when Kimberly came in. "Yes, may I help you?" she asked. "Hi, I'm Kimberly Drummond and I'm here for the modeling job." Kimberly smiled as she shook hands with the woman. "Well, hello. My name's Keesha Parker and I'm a modeling agent for Big Boom Boom's." the woman smiled.

At that moment, another, somewhat older, woman came up. "Hello, Keesha. Who's this young lady?" she asked. "This is Kimberly Drummond. She's here for the modeling job for our teen diapers." Keesha explained with a grin. "Kimberly, this is my boss, Mrs. Packard." Keesha smiled as Packard shook hands with Kimberly.

"Do you have any modeling experience?" Packard asked Kimberly. "Yeah. I modeled clothes at my last job." Kimberly said truthfully. "How old are you?" Packard asked. "I'm 16 but I'll be 17 in October." Kimberly replied. Mrs. Packard nodded and wrote this down.

"How often would you be able to work?" She asked Kimberly. "I can work every day as long as I'm home by supper." Kimberly smiled truthfully. "Ever appear in a commercial before?" Mrs. Packard asked. "Not really." Kimberly admitted. Mrs. Packard smiled kindly.

Finally, "Alright, Kimberly. You've got the job. You start tomorrow. We're filming our new commercial tomorrow so don't be too nervous. You're gonna be partnered with another young lady. She can help you or Keesha can since she'll be your modeling agent while you're with us." Mrs. Packard smiled.

"Great. Thanks." Kimberly smiled as she shook hands again with the two young women and left, the script for the commercial in her purse. She was very excited, despite the somewhat embarrassing occupation she'd agreed to do. But then again, she did know that even teenager suffer from bedwetting and/or nervous bowel/bladder systems, so maybe it wouldn't be too bad.
1143112331.title: Big Boom Booms Diapers

12133141131.content:
The One-Hundred & One Dalmatians...

Throughout Great Britain, they were renowned as the most famous group of puppies this side of the Thames, whether such a tall tale derived from the local papers interviewing the owners as to how they manage between so many Dalmatian puppies at once, or the infamous arrest of Cruella De Vil.

Suffice to say, their reputation preceded them, that's for sure!

However... Like all things in life, things mature and develop over time. And the same could be said for the 101 Dalmatian puppies. Of course, the next generation was almost as numerous as their forbearers, with a handful of the Dalmatians now grown up and having a litter of pups of their own.

Thus, our story begins, as we follow one of the offspring of Dipstick and Dottie, the spotless female Dalmatian simply referred to...as "Oddball".

=====

"Oddball! Are you coming?"

"I'm coming, Mama!"

Oddball exclaimed, letting her mother know that she was on her way to eat. ...Or at least, the best she could given her conditions.

Confused? *chuckle* Well, allow me to explain...

You see... Oddball was born a rather normal Dalmatian puppy at first. However, as she grew up enough to trot about on her own four paws, Dipstick and Dottie's owners soon discovered several..."complications" within the young pup.

Firstly, aside from her body being completely devoid of Dalmatian spots, the first thing that the couple noticed was how much weight Oddball had packed on in so little time, coupled with the realization of the pup's utter incontinence over her own bladder and bowels.

It wasn't until they took her to a veterinarian that the puppy's symptoms were diagnosed that the answers flowed. Turns out Oddball was diagnosed with a rare genetic disorder only found in spotless Dalmatians, known only as "A.I.S.", or "Albinism Incontinence Syndrome" for short.

Nonetheless, it undoubtedly left a large change in the Dalmatian's lifestyle, as Oddball waddled about on her four pawed legs, now weighing in at over 70 pounds, especially since she was nearly a year old by this point, complete with a wider girth and haunches to boot. And yet, that was the least of such alterations, for what nowadays wrapped itself around her hindquarters would be the source of her siblings' playful teasing and her mother's protective coddling:

A ludicrously padded diaper.

It was easily bulky from all sides, as it nearly scraped against the floor, whilst rendering her canine tail to become little more than a prehensile stub. What's more, it's bulk left Oddball's walking to become more of an embarrassing waddle and toddle.

However, it wasn't all that embarrassingly bad for Oddball, for her size at least allowed her to be noticeable enough to get her usual meals from the owners, most likely due to her having, as they call, "Special Needs", despite how much the thick undergarment rustled and crinkled with every step.

Currently, as she slowly waddled her way towards where her mother was at, what she soon laid her eyes upon were...
12133141131.title: She Was Born This Way

choices: Oddball decides to eat to her heart's content.
Oddball goes for her daily walkies after breakfast.
Actually Oddball decides to do something different for today.

121331411311.content:
As all of her siblings and their parents were chowing down on their dinner, as there was a full dog bowl waiting for Oddball herself as she took her place at the dinner table as she chowed down on her dinner as her parents looked at Oddball and proudly smiled at Oddball herself.

As Oddball ate her dinner she thought to herself as she chowed down.

"As I'm nearly a year old, I'll still gain weight as I'll also be bigger too meanwhile when I become an adult I'll be able to live on my own as I won't have to put up with my siblings playfully teasing me anymore." Oddball thought to herself as she smiled.

"I wonder what our daughter's thinking about dearest?" Dipstick asked his wife Dottie.

"She's probably thinking to herself that when she becomes an adult she'll move out of the house and live on her own, as she'll come and visit us when she gets a chance as our children won't playfully tease her anymore." Dottie said as she answered her husband's question.

As the family finished their dinner, so too did Oddball herself as she gained more weight as she at least now weighed at least between 80 and 90lbs as the family gathered together in the living room to watch some TV for the rest of the evening before the children and their parents took their nightly baths brushed their teeth and went to bed for the night, for as the family slept throughout the night Oddball was having a sweet dream about being bigger than anyone else.

As Oddball's sweet dream started, her siblings and parents had gathered at the breakfast table as Dottie and Dipstick called out to Oddball herself that it was time for breakfast.

"Oddball dearest it's time for breakfast!" Her parents proudly said in unison as the sound of heavy footsteps filled the room itself as the sound of heavy footsteps shook rattled and rolled everything as their children and her parents turned their attention towards Oddball herself as she heavily waddled her way into the very room itself as Oddball was much bigger than everyone else as she was also fatter to put it most mildly in a way as she sat her much bigger fatter diapered butt down onto the floor with a heavy earthquake like thud that shook and rattled everything as she spoke to her family as her deep booming voice filled the air.

"Good morning everyone!" Oddball said as she kindly greeted her family.

"Good morning dearest!" Her parents said as they greeted her.

"Good morning Oddball!" Her siblings said in unison.

"Today's gonna be a great day ergo let's eat!" Oddball proudly said.

"Indeed today's going to be a great day dearest!" Dipstick proudly said as he smiled.

"I wholeheartedly agree for today will be a great day now then everyone take your time eating your breakfast." Dottie said as the family started to eat their breakfast as Oddball chowed down.

As Oddball was eating her breakfast she thought to herself about what she was going to do today.

"After I'm done eating breakfast, what am I going to do today? Oh boy I know what I'm going to today, I'm going to either eat to my heart's content or I'll go for my daily walkies." Oddball thought to herself.

(Author's note) This next interactive chapter will be dedicated in loving memory of a former author known as Pirate King as that author is sadly no longer with us as of today as this next interactive chapter will be dedicated in loving memory of Pirate King, now then on with our exciting current chapter.

After finishing her breakfast Oddball heavily waddled her way towards the nearest kitchen sink as she rinsed her dog bowl out with water as she then dried it off with a towel and put the dog bowl back into a kitchen cabinet that's full of everyone's dog bowls including her parents own dog bowls as well, as Oddball let her parents know she was going for her daily walkies.

"Mama and Papa I'm going for my daily walkies as I'll be back as soon as possible." Oddball said as she told her parents that she was going for her daily walkies.

"All right dearest be careful now and have fun dearest!" Dottie said as she bid her daughter farewell.

"Do take care our dear sweet loving child and please do try to stay out of trouble sweetie!" Dipstick said as he too bid her farewell.

Oddball then made her way through a rather big enough doggy door as she heavily waddled her way down the house's steps and onto the sidewalk itself as she heavily waddled her way through their quaint peaceful neighborhood as Oddball kept her head held high as she was full of confidence and self esteem.

As she passed through their quaint peaceful neighborhood every animal in the neighborhood upon seeing Oddball herself waddle on by could only stare at her in shock and awe while most of them ran away screaming in terror as it looked like they were being terrorized by a monster of some sort, but Oddball wasn't a monster for she was a big fat beautiful female Dalmatian who currently wore an oversized Huggies brand of diaper known as a big fat movers diaper.

As Oddball approached the city's downtown area herself, her nose picked up the scent of delicious British cuisines as Oddball put her big fat paws together and stuck out her tongue as her current expression on her face meant that she was hungry and ready to chow down.

"Mmm mmm I smell the scent of delicious British cuisines as it's coming from that direction." Oddball said as her deep booming voice could be heard throughout all of downtown London as most of the city's citizens took immediate notice of a rather big fat female Dalmatian who was wearing an oversized Huggies diaper heavily waddle in their direction as most of the city's citizens immediately moved out of her way and could only stare at her in total shock and awe while the city's other citizens screamed in terror and ran for their lives as Oddball heavily waddled her way down the city's sidewalks as Oddball continued to follow the scent of delicious British cuisines as Oddball had found the very place that scent of delicious British cuisines was coming from, as it was coming from a nearby restaurant/fast food joint or two as there was an eating contest that was due to take place at an outdoor/indoor restaurant in downtown London as Oddball decided to.....

1213314113114.content:
And yet, just before she could even come to a decision, the waking world beckoned it's call to Oddball, as the dreaming world began to distort and warp until it ceased to exist...

=====

"Hey, sis! You up yet?"

A voice rang throughout Oddball's floppy canine ears, as she slowly stirred from her slumber. At first, her vision was greatly blurred, but after a few brief moments, her eyes dilated and focused until her sight became clear, which gave way to her finally laying her eyes upon her slightly older brother, Domino, who gazed upon her with a reassuring smirk upon his snout.

It was certainly a welcome sight, for sure. After all, out of Oddball's other siblings, Domino was one of the handful few who don't actually tease her for her conditions, which she was very grateful for.

"Morning, sis!"

He greeted, giving his much heftier sister a good morning lick in response, garnering a smile from the younger sibling, as well as a cheeky giggle in the process, quickly replying,

"*giggle* Morning to you too, big bro!"

Luckily for Oddball, being this fat did have one to two positive perks, one of which included being able to keep herself warm at night without cuddling up next to her parents or siblings. Although, she certainly didn't mind a little pampering every now and then, as she sluggishly rose to her paws, shrugging off a small blanket she pulled over herself the previous night.

And yet, as the fabric floated to the ground, this ultimately revealed the obvious on Oddball's person, resolving in the form of...

"Good morning Dearest as breakfast is ready for you!" Dottie said as she proudly greeted her daughter.

"Good morning Oddball!" Her siblings proudly said in unison.

"Good morning everybody!" Oddball proudly said as she proudly greeted her siblings.

After greeting each other the family sat down at their table and ate their breakfast as did Oddball as she started to gain some more weight as Oddball finished up her breakfast, as she took her dog bowl into the kitchen rinsed it out with some water and then dried it up with a towel as she put her dog bowl away by putting into a nearby kitchen cabinet that was filled with everyone else's dog bowls including their parents dog bowls as well.

Oddball then heavily waddled her way back to her room as she played with some of her chew toys as her parents proudly came into her room as they had quite a big surprise for their daughter as it was.....

12133141132.content:
It all began one day across the pond in merry Olde England, as Oddball's siblings planned a prank they were going to play on their sister as she noticed there was a big bulky nappy and some highly fattening dog food that her siblings had set up as part of their prank they were going to play on their sister.

"Huh I wonder where this big bulky nappy came from? Well I may as well put it on anyway even though it's big and bulky." Oddball said as she put on the big bulky nappy as she looked at herself in a mirror as she noticed there was something missing from this equation.

Oddball said as she walked over to where her dog bowl was at as she ate all of that highly fattening dog food as she let out a small belch.

*Urp* "Excuse me" Oddball said.

1311131.content:
It all began early one spring morning in 1963 as a car drove up to the Xavier academy of mutants as the gates opened up as the car slowly drove past the gates themselves, as Kitty Pryde looked at the mansion itself as her eyes were aglow as the car stopped by the front doors as the car's driver and Kitty stepped out of the car itself, as they unloaded her luggage.

The car's driver then stepped into his car and drove off into the distance as Kitty Pryde picked up her luggage and entered the mansion itself, as Ororo Monroe greeted her.

"Welcome to the Xavier school for mutants and we do hope you enjoy your stay, and if you need anything please don't be afraid to let us know." Ororo said.

After being kindly greeted by Ororo Monroe Kitty made her way over to her dormitory where she unloaded her luggage and put it into a nearby closet as she noticed a nappy and some nearby food for her.

"Who left this nappy in here? Oh well." Kitty said as she ate some nearby food that was on a plate for her to eat after she put on her nappy.

choices: Kitty's recruited into the Massachusetts Academy (Issue #151)
When Emma tries to recruit Kitty (Issue #129)
13111321.title: White Queen

choices: Emma is fatter and wearing a diaper, though Kitty isn't aware of the latter.
131113211.content:
It was a rainy day as a young girl exited the airport terminal in Massachusetts. She was a 13 and-a-half year old girl with brown bushy hair and a Star of David necklace. Her name, was Katherine Pryde, also know as "Kitty". Up until a week ago, she had been a student at Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters and a member of the super hero team called "The X-Men" as Sprite.

Her mutant power was the ability to phase through solid objects, including humans and other beings. She could also walk on air due to her powers. She had joined the school a few months earlier after her powers had surfaced and since then, she'd fought a demon single handedly on Christmas eve.

She also had recently fought both Garrok the sun god and Magneto himself with the other X-Men. It was after this latest mission that Kitty learned that, for at least the rest of the school year, she was to be transferred to Emma Frost's Massachusetts academy by her parents, to her dismay.

Emma had been the first to try and recruit her months prior. Like the X-Men, Emma was a mutant herself, a telepath much like Professor X himself, with the added ability to make her body into a diamond like substance, similar to Colossus' mutant ability to make his body into an organic steel.

However, Kitty had gone with Xavier's, especially after Emma and the Hellfire Club had captured Storm, Colossus and Logan and nearly captured Kitty, Cyclops, Phoenix, Nightcrawler and another mutant, the popular disco performer Dazzler, who the latter trio of X-Men had gone to recruit as well.

Kitty was thus uneasy about the transfer to Emma's, even though her parents assured her that she could go back to Xavier's if she either didn't like Emma's school after a few weeks or if she didn't like it by the term's end. According to the person Kitty had talked to at the desk after getting off her flight, Ema would be picking her up in a bit.

Sure enough, a sleek, black limo pulled up in front of Kitty and out stepped the White Queen herself. Kitty just stared at the blond telepath in front of her. Emma had originally been thin and actually quite attractive when she had last seen her. But now, she was very different...
131113211.title: Kitty's recruited into the Massachusetts Ac...

choices: Emma Frost, in an attempt to make peace with Kitty.
Actually, they soon arrived at the institute shortly thereafter.
1311132111.content:
"...Katherine Pryde, I presume?"

Those were the first words Kitty heard her say to her, despite the young mutant's sparse familiarity with the Hellfire Club member. Or at least, what Kitty thought she'd knew until now.

Instead of a svelte and lithe blonde vixen, this newly rotund Emma Frost certainly had a "presence" to her, so to speak. Her seemingly angelic white garb did little to conceal such plumpness, with a prominent bulge of a belly covered by the silky fabric. Her legs, despite their bulk, still retained an attractive smoothness to them, along with her plump meaty gloved arms.

Her breasts meanwhile, remained as round and perky as before, but with noticeably more volume to them. Not to mention her face was accentuated with a notable softness to it, accompanied by a pair of plump cheeks and a subtle yet potential double chin. Finally, despite the fabric futilely concealing it's size, her buttocks was as equally as bulky, accompanied by this near-silent ambience of...crinkling?

Kitty brushed the momentary thought shortly thereafter, only responding to Emma's question with a meekly affirmative nod. From there, like a matronly matriarch, the enlarged Emma Frost kindly gestured for Kitty to willingly enter the limousine, to which the young teenager had reluctantly complied, with Emma's chauffeur promptly putting Kitty's luggage within the limo's trunk.

And with that, as all the aforementioned entered the vehicle, the lavish vehicle drove off to a preordained destination:

Saint Martha's Institution For Extraordinary Ladies...

====

The ride itself to the institute was arguably a lengthy one, to say the least. After all, Kitty was still a little..."apprehensive", in regards to being in the near vicinity of one of the people who attempted to bring harm to her friends back at Xavier's school. Although, Emma certainly didn't fault her for such thoughts. However, the first one to speak and break the stalemate of silence would be...
1311132111.title: A Padded Prelude of Things To Come...

choices: A week later, Kitty's began wetting her bed and is rather chubby/plump
13111321112.content:
Emma. "So, Katherine... how have you been since you started at Xavier's?" She asked. Kitty, who'd been starting at Emma's new body, quickly looked up and blushed again. "A-Alright, I guess. But I'm still upset that my parents decided to send me to your school towards the end of the term." She remarked nervously.

"And if I am not mistaken, you're also uneasy around me because of our last encounter in Chicago." Emma smiled knowingly. Kitty nodded after a moment. "Well... yeah. I mean, you're a member of the Hellfire Club and I couldn't exactly mention this to Mom and Dad, cause then they'd probably freak and withdrawn me from the X-Men anyway." Kitty confessed.

"Understand, Katherine, I truly do not mean to hurt you or anyone his time. As part of my agreement with your parents, come either June or after a few days, you will have the choice to decide wither or not to stay at St. Martha's next year or not, no strings attached." Emma said after a moment with a kind smile.

Kitty considered Emma's actually kind sounding words. She really wanted to believe it, despite herself. The attack on her, Wolverine, Storm and Colossus and the ensuing rescue mission for the latter trio, was still pretty vivid in her memories. But now, looking at the squishy, doughy and plump Emma, Kitty felt like maybe this wouldn't be so bad.

"Okay. I'll give it a shot." Kitty smiled back. At that, Emma smiled and nodded, leaning back slightly in her seat. "Good. Now, would you like some food?" she asked. "Sure." Kitty beamed. With the push of a button, Emma revealed a massive, junk food feast. There was a massive deep fried turkey, a big tray of hamburgers, six extra-extra large pizzas, a giant basket of biscuits, 14 super duper sundaes with chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, blue moon and mint ice cream with whipped cream, hot fudge and a cherry and 17 massive 6 layered cakes.

"Woah." Kitty said in shock. "At St. Martha's, we never let our young girls go hungry." Emma smiled as she tore a big drumstick off her turkey. Kitty slowly took a rather big burger and timidly took a nibble. The second she did, her taste buds erupted in cheers. Without a word, she nosily gobbled it down and then grabbed another.

As they ate, occasionally talking, burping or farting, Emma frowned slightly as she watched Kitty's growing appetite becoming more evident, her usually trim belly slowly starting to become pudgy. "That's what I was afraid of. It's starting to effect Katherine as well. It's only a matter of time before she's in a diaper herself." Emma sighed mentally as they kept eating.
13111321112.title: Emma Frost, in an attempt to make peace with Ki...

choices: Meanwhile, Emma Frost was overseeing some papers before being visited...
Eventually, the trio finally made their way to Emma Frost's office.
Actually, something happened along the way...
131113211121.content:
"*sigh* Not again..."

Kitty soberly noted, looking over what brought about such woes: A noticeable wet stain on her bed, undoubtedly caused by her own case of bedwetting.

Needless to say, Kitty Pryde felt rather...shameful for such a regression.

However, her slowly developing incontinence was not her only cause for concern, as the young girl briefly gazed upon her reflection in a nearby full-body mirror. Gone was the petite teenager, and in it's place stood a noticeably chubby specimen.

Kitty's face was a little fuller, with the budding of a double chin. Looking downward, one could easily see she had gone up two bra sizes, as such breasts now sat upon an even more notable bump of a belly. Meanwhile, her hips and butt were not unaffected by such a weight gain as well, with her thighs beginning the process of touching one another whilst standing still. Overall, this was certainly more than the usual "Freshman 15" she's heard about.

Thankfully, Kitty had gotten herself changed out of her partially soaked garments, but still felt the stigma of shame, as she hastily contemplated,

"...H-How did this even happen again? I'm not a little kid anymore..."

But then, her thoughts were soon interrupted by the turning of a doorknob, with the presence of her fellow classmates, Katie and Rahne, both mutants with their own uniquely respective abilities. The first to speak was the redheaded Scot herself, as Rahne took heed of Kitty's predicament with a kind word,

"...You alright, lassie?"

Her lupine senses soon took heed of the distinct scent of urine in the air, which made Kitty's predicament all the more embarrassing. Fortunately, she had two amazing friends by her side, with Katie only speaking while she hugged the young Pryde,

"Oh, Kitty..."

"...C'mon. Let's get her to see the Headmistress. I'm pretty sure she'll know what to do."

Rahne retorted, with Kitty only agreeing with a reluctant nod in response, as the chubby trio did their best to stealthily escort the embarrassed Kitty Pryde to Headmistress Frost's office without drawing any unwanted attention...for Kitty's sake, of course.
131113211121.title: Infantile Side Effects...

13133111.content: What shall occur with the fiery red-head?
13133111.title: Mary-Jane Watson

choices: She gains weight for an acting job
131331111.title: Weight Gain

1313311112.content:
When Mephisto decided he wanted Spider-man's marriage and the wall crawling hero accepted, Mary-Jane was so furious that she asked Mephisto to do them one better and erase their whole relationship. The Hell-lord accepted, but did so in a way that she never anticipated. Peter had originally shunned MJ for fear that she would, at best, resemble the Hulk. Mephisto was inspired by this and altered history so that she was obese and had poor manners at best. This was enough to turn the younger Parker off despite her overall looks and character remaining the same.

Fast-forward to the present day, Mj was happily lazing on her couch and balancing a bucket of kfc on her boulder belly as she snacked and watched the news. Spider-man was a fascination for her, but she had no idea why. She didn't even like him...did she? She'd asked that same question of herself every day for so long.

Finishing her chicken with a loud belch, Mary-Jane patted her gut and waddled out the door to do some shopping. She'd recently been paid for her latest plus-size modeling job and was eager to spend it. Along the way she saw someone she knew. Who was it?
1313311112.title: One More Day, Brand New MJ

choices: Felicia wins all three contests using her powers.
MJ wins all three contests. Black Cat tries stealing her prize.
13133111121.content: Felicia was still Black Cat, but was now fat like M.J. The two were professional rivals and could often be found competing over just about anything. Who could eat more? Who could belch louder? Whose gut was biggest? Whose fart smelled worse? Felicia was generally able to win all the thanks to her powers, though MJ didn't know that. Felicia was on her way to a new buffet opening in town and challenged her old rival to all three of their usual contests of eating, belching, and farting. The buffet had a huge cash prize that was bigger than Mary-Jane's current paycheck, so the redhead eagerly accepted. What happens?
13133111121.title: Felicia Hardy.

1511113.content:
It all began as the sun rose in the east as Kitty Pryde had been brought to Charles Xavier's school for mutants as she walked through the gates themselves as she walked through the school's hallways.

"I'd never thought I'd be here at a place like this, as this seems kind of spooky to me." Kitty said.

"There's no need to feel spooked Ms. Pryde, for my name is Charles Xavier as you'll feel most welcome here my dear as you'll learn from the very best instructors our school has to offer." Professor Xavier said.

Now what will happen next?

1512.title: Rolie Polie Olie (1998)

15121.content: What happens to the main bot on the show?
15121.title: Olie Polie

choices: Overindulges on the Ice Cream planet
151211.content: How's this gonna happen to him?
151211.title: Weight gain

choices: A week later, Olie's put on a large amount of weight, resembling a boulder
1512112.content:
One day, Olie Polie was alone in his house. His mother and father had gone away for the month, leaving his younger sister Zoey in the care of their uncle Gizmo and his friend Billy and his family were away on their home planet for a month as well. So Olie had nothing much to do.

"Golly, what'm I gonna do this month?" He wondered as he sat on his bed. Then, it hit him. He looked out his telescope and saw the Ice Cream Planet, a planet devoted to any type of ice cream you could imagine. He'd been there a few times before, but that'd mainly been with either one of his parents and/or Zoey accompanying them.

"Mom and Dad did say I could use Coupy to get around if I needed to." He smiled as he went into the garage and got into said car. Soon, he was landing on the Ice Cream planet. As usual, it had massive spoons, ice cream bowls and cones every where, as well as giant ice cream mountains, hills and scoops of different flavors.

"This is gonna be totally keeno!" Olie cheered as he began running around, looking for something to start his month long ice cream diet. After looking around carefully, he found several, fairly small ice cream cones. "This' a good start!" He smiled as he grabbed four of them (Chocolate, strawberry, Vanilla and Rocky Road) and began licking them eagerly.

After finishing them, he continued on, looking for more frozen desserts to gobble down. After some walking, he found what was probably the biggest ice cream sundae he'd ever seen on any of his previous trips to the planet. It was as big as he was, with chocolate, vanilla and strawberry ice cream, whipped cream and hot fudge on it.

"Attention Mission Control: stopping to pickup more supplies!" Olie joked as he ran up to it and began eating, starting from the chocolate ice cream scoop and then slowly munching his way into the vanilla before finally exiting the strawberry one, his face a mess of ice cream and his belly visibly larger, having completely eaten the whole sundae.

After taking a moment to catch his breath, Olie then staggered slightly to sit down, patting his ball sized tummy obliviously. "That was a good first day of ice cream food. I think I will take a little nap before I go to get dinner." He said as he laid on his side and began sleeping. He was so full, he ended up sleeping all evening.
1512112.title: Overindulges on the Ice Cream planet

choices: The next day Olie wanders into a big city.
You the reader get to choose what happens next.
15121121.content:
As a week passed Olie had gained a large amount of weight, as he resembled that of a boulder as his belly was now much bigger than before as his arms had grown as large as his belly was as his hips were now bigger as his thighs were huge as his feet happened to be as big as his belly was.

Olie heavily waddled his way through town as the citizens of the Ice Cream planet stood in utter shock and awe while most of them screamed and ran away in terror as Olie spotted a big enough banana split that he could eat.

"Oh goody there's a big enough banana split for me to eat!" Olie gleefully said as he heavily waddled his way over to where the big enough banana split was at as he mindlessly chowed down as he started to gain more weight as he eventually finished off the big banana split itself as he let loose a huge burp.

*Urappppppp* Excuse me Olie said as he continued to heavily waddle his way through town as he spotted a big tub that contained a rather big hot fudge sundae with lots and lots of whipped cream along with a cherry on top as Olie's eyes were aglow.

"That's a big tub full of hot fudge sundae that a big guy like me can eat!" Olie cheerfully said as he climbed his way into the big tub itself and started to eat all of the hot fudge sundae that big tub contained as Olie not only gained more weight but he also gained height in the process as Olie was now as big that tub was.

As the sun went down that evening Olie laid down to rest up for the night as he a rather big day ahead him the next day.
15121121.title: A week later, Olie's put on a large amount ...

1512131.content:
It all began one day as Olie was looking at the stars via his telescope as he saw what appeared to be a new planet of sorts.

"I've never seen this planet before as it must be new, and I may as well visit this new planet." Olie said.

Olie then boarded his rocket ship and flew towards the new planet itself as he noticed the new planet had a few continents with big cities small towns and villages as he landed his rocket ship on a new planet known as the big fat and or giant baby planet as he stepped on out of his rocket ship as he was greeted by a few friendly denizens of this planet.

"Welcome to our planet known as the big fat and or giant baby planet and we do hope you enjoy your visit, also allow us to put you into a specially designed Huggies Luvs and or Pampers brand of diaper." One of the planet's denizens said as he put Olie into a specially designed Huggies Luvs and or Pampers brand of diaper.

"And you must be quite hungry given that you've traveled here to our world as we have lots of junk food that's quite fattening ergo we've prepared a special feast for you, ergo eat hearty my boy." The denizens said as they proudly walked off as there was lots of junk food that the eye could see as Olie chowed down as he started to gain weight like no tomorrow.

Now what will happen next?
1512131.title: Goes to a new planet where he's put in diap...

choices: A restaurant where he's fed until he feels sick to his tummy
15121312.content: Where does Olie end up after wandering for a bit and coming across the town?
15121312.title: Olie wanders his way through one of the planet&...

choices: Our hero finds a place to rest.
Our hero finds a great big pool and takes off his diaper.
Our hero stops at a cost free motel for now.
151213121.content:
After wandering for a bit through town he found a fast food joint whereas he entered the restaurant as they immediately tended to him at his table.

"Surprise me." He said.

Right away they started to feed him plenty of greasy fast food as he started to gain more weight as his specially designed diaper was starting to expand as well until he started to feel sick to his stomach as they knew he had reached his limit as they stopped feeding him as he got up from his table he was at.

Now what will our hero do next?
151213121.title: A restaurant where he's fed until he feels ...

1512131212.content: Is this a normal pool or is it filled with something like ice cream or melted chocolate?
1512131212.title: Our hero finds a great big pool and takes off h...

choices: Olie looks for more ice cream.
Olie looks for greasy fast food.
15121312122.content:
Upon leaving the restaurant itself and after heavily waddling for quite a bit, our hero found a great big swimming pool that was full of ice cream, as our hero looked at the great big swimming pool in awe as he knew he was about to grow to being the size of this great big swimming pool.

"Oh boy a great big swimming pool full of ice cream? They think of everything I'd want ergo make way for a soon to be fat giant!" Olie said as he removed his regular diaper which hit the ground with a thud as Olie was now huge fat and bare butt naked as he stomped his way into the great big swimming pool as he not only swam his way through all of that delicious ice cream but he also started to eat it all up as his weight increased as his size was increasing too as Olie was now the size of the great big swimming pool itself.

What will happen next?
15121312122.title: Ice cream

choices: He ends up hungry and finds a large candy store that gives him free candies
He has to use the bathroom and relieves himself in his new diaper
15121314.title: Something happens.

choices: Olie goes on a giant sized eating spree.
Olie takes a stroll through a big city.
151213141.content:
After having eaten all sorts of junk food Olie's stomach rumbled as he realized he was hungry once again, as he heavily waddled his way through town as he found a large candy store with free candies as Olie's eyes were aglow.

"Oh boy there's a large candy store and there's also free candies ergo it's chow time!" Olie said as he heavily waddled his way inside as the employees let him eat in peace as they stepped aside and let Olie eat to his heart's content.

Olie started eating every piece of candy there was as his weight started to increase as did his size as he started to grow bigger as he worked his way up to each one of the large candy store's floors as he devoured each and every piece of candy there was until he finally outgrew the large candy store itself as Olie was now a fat giant who was looming over everyone and everything.

Now what will happen next?
151213141.title: He ends up hungry and finds a large candy store...

151333353222222221.content: We'll start with Wasp and Miss Marvel.
151333353222222221.title: yes!

15133335322222222111.content: Wasp and Miss Marvel were bored one day after the Avengers defeated Galactus. No super villains seemed to pop up anywhere. They decided to challenge each other to an eating contest and see who could gorge on the most junk food. Carol ate and ate, but Wasp used her shrinking power to stay in the lead. When it was done, they began to argue over who won and something else. What was it?
15133335322222222111.title: Weight Gain

choices: Wasp suggests a week long gorge fest to see who can get fatter.
151333353222222221112.content:
They decided on a belching contest. Carol was convinced that she could beat Jan if the latter was planning on staying Wasp-sized. To her surprise, Jan grew back to her full, normal size. "Thought you were gonna stay small, Jan." Carol remarked in shock. "Nah. Figured I should be normal sized for this." Jan giggled, rubbing her bloated belly.

The burping contest than began. *UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPPP!* Carol burped loudly, her belch shaking the kitchen. "Not bad," Jan giggled. "But can you top this one?" and then she opened her own mouth.

*OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPP PPPP!!!* She belched loudly, louder than Carol, much to the latter's dismay. "It's on now, Jan." Carol spat as she began straining to make another burp come up.

On and on it went, Jan and Carol's burping getting bigger and bigger and louder and louder and smellier and smellier, each big, stinky and long burp outdoing the last.

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLCCCCHHHH!!!*

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP!!!*

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP!!!*

Finally, in the end, to Carol's dismay, it was Jan who won the match.
